attributes.action: Retain the Proms series of concerts and in particular the Last Night festivities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Minister for the Arts has called for the Proms concerts-especially the Last Night-to be axed as it 'does not promote a common identity, reflects imperialist tradition and does not promote the right sort of Britishness'. These have been an outstanding feature of the cultural calendar since 1895,making music of all forms accessible to the general public  and the Last Night in particular has been a much loved tradition for all cultures and backgrounds to celebrate the national music of the British countries.
